definition: soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
to fight at the head of one's troops/(fig.) to take the lead
lackey/errand boy/lit. runner before a carriage
lit. peddlers and carriers/common people/lower class
to complete a course of study (old)/to graduate

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis of subacute pituitary apoplexy and evaluate the surgical results.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨亚急性垂体卒中的诊断及评价手术治疗效果。

sentences.english: Perhaps sotsukon is the ultimate climax of that individualization.
sentences.chinese: 也许“卒婚”是这种个性化的终极表现。

sentences.english: Depression is a common complication after a stroke.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁是卒中后的一种常见并发症。

sentences.english: Stroke patients were then followed prospectively to assess recurrent stroke and death.
sentences.chinese: 并前瞻性的随访卒中患者，评估再发卒中和死亡。

sentences.english: Stroke patients were then followed prospectively to assess recurrent stroke and death.
sentences.chinese: 并前瞻性的随访卒中患者，评估再发卒中和死亡。

sentences.english: The jailer had fallen asleep while a couple of prisoners were singing hymns.
sentences.chinese: 在禁卒睡著的时候，有两个囚犯在唱圣诗。

sentences.english: Patent foramen ovale and recurrent stroke closure is the best option?
sentences.chinese: 卵圆孔未闭与复发性卒中经皮封堵术是最佳选择吗？

sentences.english: How might antioxidant-rich foods reduce this stroke risk?
sentences.chinese: 那富含抗氧化剂的食物如何降低卒中的风险的呢？

sentences.english: Carotid artery stenosis is one of the major causes of ischemic stroke.
sentences.chinese: 颈动脉狭窄是缺血性卒中的主要病因之一。

sentences.english: Intracranial atherosclerotic stenosis(ICAS)is a high-risk cause of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 颅内动脉粥样硬化性狭窄是卒中的高危因素。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss the reason of brain tumor apoplexy after Gamma Knife treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑瘤患者伽玛刀治疗后肿瘤卒中的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of hyperbaric oxygen in the treatment of post-stroke depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察高压氧治疗卒中后抑郁症的疗效。

sentences.english: Date of birth unknown, died Yuanshizhu Emperor Yuan 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 生年不详，卒于元世祖至元二十六年。

sentences.english: With Yan Liben only to literature, died by artist.
sentences.chinese: 昔阎立本始以文学进身，卒蒙画师之耻。

sentences.english: There were 4354 stroke hospitalizations during follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 在随访过程中有4354例发生卒中住院。

definition: prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
